element.name: DESCRIPTION
element.text: This algorithm removes holes from polygons in a polygon layer. A hole is an empty area within a polygon. Polygons with holes are defined as a envelope polygon (the outter contour) and a set of inner ones (the holes). This algorithm transform each polygon, removing those inner subpolygons and leaving just the outter one.

element.name: RESULT
element.text: The resulting layer, with polygons with no holes. The attributes table is left unmodified
